document.full_text: enayatullah balegh is a professor at kabul university and preaches on fridays in the largest mosque in central kabul, where he advocates jihad, or holy war, against foreigners who desecrate islam.
document.title: anti-western messages grow among afghanistan's imams
lines_and_colors: enayatullah balegh is a professor at kabul university and preaches on fridays in the largest mosque in central kabul, where he advocates jihad, or holy war, against foreigners who desecrate islam.
